Click on the map's icons to see information about the landmarks.

Back to Start

New Fortress

The New Fortress is a prominent fortification in Corfu, Greece, offering historical insights and panoramic views of the island.

Saint Theodora

Saint Theodora is a revered landmark in Corfu, known for its rich history and religious significance.

Venetian Well

The Venetian Well is a charming historical landmark in Corfu, celebrated for its Venetian-era architecture.

Byzantine Museum

The Byzantine Museum in Corfu offers a collection of artifacts showcasing the island's Byzantine history.

Asian Arts Museum

The Asian Arts Museum is one of the most important cultural institutions in Corfu, with an extensive collection of Asian art.

Saint Spyridon

Saint Spyridon is a revered church in Corfu, famous for its connection to the island's patron saint.

Old Fortress

The Old Fortress is an iconic historical site offering spectacular views of the sea and the city of Corfu.

Spianada

Spianada is a vast square in Corfu, renowned for its size and historical significance.

Ionian Academy

The Ionian Academy is a key educational and cultural institution in Corfu, known for its neoclassical architecture.

Mon Repos

Mon Repos is a neoclassical mansion located in a scenic area, offering a glimpse into Corfu's aristocratic past.

Catholic Church

The Catholic Church in Corfu is a remarkable example of baroque architecture, located in the heart of the city.

Music Museum

The Music Museum in Corfu is home to a vast collection of musical instruments, reflecting the island's rich musical history.

Ionian Banknote

The Ionian Banknote Museum features a rich collection of historical currency notes from the Ionian Islands.

Casa Parlante

Casa Parlante is a fascinating museum that offers a glimpse into the life of the Corfiot aristocracy through interactive exhibits.
